description:
The Meltran Battleship, like the http://anidb.net/ch49104 [Meltran Destroyer], is a mainstay combat warship of the Meltlandi fleet. Some 2,700 meters in length, the ship is larger and more heavily armed than the destroyer and is most likely used as a command vessel for smaller formations and groups within a larger fleet.
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/meltran-battleship.htm
name: Meltlan Battleship
